name: Mahou Shoujo Sherry!
description:
The Shadows are corrupting the city!

And only one can save us, Magical Girl Sherry!

Help Sherry use her magical girl powers of cherry blossoms to defeat the evil shadows and bring peace back to the city! :D

PixelArt, Animations & UI: Orc Wizard (https://nerissy.itch.io/)

Programming, Pixel Art & Animations: Spookto (https://spookto.itch.io/)

Music & SFX: Daryl Barnes Music (https://darylbarnes.itch.io/)
